author: Reuters Editorial
title: Lionco Pharmaceutical Group says dividend payment date on May 10
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Lionco Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.4 yuan (before tax) per share and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.4 new shares for every share for 2017, to shareholders of record on May 9
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 10 and the dividend will be paid on May 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Fa45Ad
 (Beijing Headline News)
